settings.html_code:
SECOND SKIN -LIGHT WEIGHT

Our most popular performance, leisurewear fabric. Light in weight with a super soft peach hand feel. Provides the wearer supreme comfort with an excellent range of movement due to its stretch ability. Is quick drying and wrinkle free.

Recommended for: Light to moderate workouts and leisurewear.

SECOND SKIN - MEDIUM WEIGHT

Excellent quality with a medium weight thickness. Manufactured in a clean-faced solid color. Beautifully soft to the touch with stretch in every corner. Perfect for the female who wants a little more sliming and hold without a heavy compression feel.

Recommended for: Light to moderate workouts, streetwear, leisurewear

SOFT COMPRESSION - HEAVY WEIGHT

A soft compression fabric that offers supreme comfort plus performance. Super stretch ability that holds and shapes. If you prefer a more supportive feel in your sportswear this fabric would be a good choice for you. Sweat-wicking and breathable, great for sweaty workouts. Not See-Through and squat proof.

Recommended for: Multisport and leisurewear

COMPRESSION - HEAVY WEIGHT

A thicker Nylon, Spandex blend. Designed with wick ability to allow moisture to pass through the surface of the fabric away from your skin. A great performance fabric that keeps you cool and dry. Holds its shape, will not pill or fade.

Recommended for: Multisport and heavier workouts

ANTI-BACTERIAL - LIGHT WEIGHT

A thicker Nylon, Spandex blend. Designed with wick ability to allow moisture to pass through the surface of the fabric away from your skin. A great performance fabric that keeps you cool and dry. Holds its shape, will not pill or fade.

Recommended for: Multisport, gym workouts and leisurewear.

SEAMLESS

Made with our cutting-edge knitting techniques, this collection is set to revolutionize fit, function, shape, and style, so forget pinching, rubbing, or digging, and feel free, focused, and fabulous because they are breathable, squat proof and offer tummy support with a soft compression feel. Our knits move with your body to hug your curves in all the right places in the most flattering way.

Recommended for: High impact workouts, leisurewear
